mapper.select: SELECT s.PRODUCT_ID, p.NAME , s.amount, sr.current_amount, sc.NAME category FROM ( SELECT sum(PLMA*AMOUNT)amount, PRODUCT_ID FROM STOCK GROUP BY PRODUCT_ID HAVING amount <= 10 ORDER BY amount)s JOIN( SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PLMA*AMOUNT current_amount , CATEGORY_ID, REG_DATE FROM STOCK WHERE ID in (SELECT max(ID)id from STOCK GROUP BY PRODUCT_ID) )sr on s.PRODUCT_ID = sr.PRODUCT_ID JOIN STOCK_CATEGORY sc on sr.CATEGORY_ID = sc.ID JOIN PRODUCT p on s.PRODUCT_ID = p.ID;
